* Desmonus exited the Alliance base, looking around at the sunlight that 
beat down on her.
Nasty light!
Desmonus moved a pair of shades over mer yellow optics before transforming 
into beast mode, slithering along the ground for a few moments before 
lifting off into the air.
She hated to travel at night but her scanners told her thet her prey was out 
in the field, by the CF but still there none the less.
The flight from the Alliance base to the CF wasn't all that long, seeing the 
reflective metal of the Maximal base before she actually saw that it was 
under attack.
She dropped to the grasslands a bit of ways away so that she might have a 
hope of sneaking up without being shot.
She was hungry, not looking for a fight.
Desmonus smiled when she heard Reflector yell out a death threat to the 
Maximals, slithering on through the grass but remembering that there were 
patches of open land thanks to the Alliance attack.
But she'd have the chance to get to that meal.*
